name: Samhain Pumpkin Bread
author: LApagmom2
summary: This recipe was shared with me years ago by a friend. Since then it's been tweaked and modified to its current form. Perfect for Samhain celebrations. The spices in this pumpkin bread blend together nicely, representing all things desired with the promise of new beginnings.
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir the flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, and cloves together in a large bowl
Whisk together the pumpkin, water, eggs, vanilla, and vegetable oil together in a separate bowl
Gradually pour the wet mixture into the dry while whisking until everything is well mixed
Fold the walnuts into the batter
Divide the batter between the two prepared loaf pans
Bake in the preheated oven until the top is golden and springs back when lightly pressed, 50 to 60 minutes
Allow to cool 20 minutes before removing from the pans
